description: Updates the configuration or properties of an existing direct query data source in Amazon OpenSearch Service.

parameters.name: DataSourceName
parameters.description: A unique, user-defined label to identify the data source within your OpenSearch Service environment.

parameters.name: DataSourceType
parameters.description: The supported Amazon Web Services service that you want to use as the source for direct queries in OpenSearch Service. CloudWatchLog (dict) --- Specifies CloudWatch Logs as a type of data source for direct queries. The unique identifier of the IAM role that grants OpenSearch Service permission to access the specified data source. SecurityLake (dict) --- Specifies Security Lake as a type of data source for direct queries. The unique identifier of the IAM role that grants OpenSearch Service permission to access the specified data source.

nested_params.name: CloudWatchLog
nested_params.description: Specifies CloudWatch Logs as a type of data source for direct queries.

nested_params.name: RoleArn
nested_params.description: The unique identifier of the IAM role that grants OpenSearch Service permission to access the specified data source.

nested_params.name: SecurityLake
nested_params.description: Specifies Security Lake as a type of data source for direct queries.

nested_params.name: RoleArn
nested_params.description: The unique identifier of the IAM role that grants OpenSearch Service permission to access the specified data source.

parameters.name: OpenSearchArns
parameters.description: A list of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) for the OpenSearch collections that are associated with the direct query data source. (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: DataSourceArn
nested_items.description: The unique, system-generated identifier that represents the data source.
